empty_slot.componentleveltooltip: Bound Artefact Slot||Once attained, Ancestor Relics you choose to use for the Great Drill will appear here.
Claimed Artefact Slot||Once attained, Ancestor Relics you choose to claim for yourself will appear here.

component_text.text: After completing this mission you will receive a dilemma allowing you to either use the relic to power the Great Drill or claim the relic for yourself to gain different effects.
